组件

textinput

组件1

affixbutton

Affix #

Fix the element to a specific visible area.

var name = '';

Basic usage1 #

Affix is fixed at the top of the page by default.

You can set offset attribute to change the offset top，the default value is 0。

Basic usage2 #

Affix is fixed at the top of the page by default.

You can set offset attribute to change the offset top，the default value is 0。

Events #

Event NameDescriptionParameters
changetriggers when fixed state changed(value: boolean)
scrolltriggers when scrollingscroll top and fixed state

Methods #

MethodDescriptionParameters
updateupdate affix state manually—
inputbutton
